hypothesis_content.title: Asian Session Liquidity Drop Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes, BTC price moves initiating in Asian trading hours (00:00-08:00 UTC) with volume >120% of London/NYC average have 70% probability of reversing during London open (08:00 UTC) due to liquidity mismatch.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Asian crypto liquidity is more retail-driven and sentiment-based. London institutional flow provides counter-balancing liquidity. Moves on elevated Asian volume often represent overreactions that correct when deeper European liquidity enters.
entry_conditions: Volume during move >120% of average London session volume
Move occurs without major news catalyst

exit_conditions.take_profit: 50% retracement of Asian-hours move by 10:00 UTC
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price continues trending in same direction past 11:00 UTC

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Asian-hour moves persist through London session in >40% of cases, indicating structural change in global liquidity patterns.
